mapper.sql: SELECT ri.create_time, ri.update_time, ri.delete_time, ri.classroom, ri.problem, ri.repair_item_id, ri.state, ri.orderer, ri.orderer_phone, u2.`name` AS orderer_name, ri.receiver, u1.phone AS receiver_phone, u1.`name` AS receiver_name, qa.title FROM repair_item ri LEFT JOIN user_info u1 ON ri.receiver = u1.id LEFT JOIN user_info u2 ON ri.orderer = u2.id LEFT JOIN qa_type qa ON ri.equipment_type = qa.id
mapper.select:
WHERE 1 != 1
or ri.repair_item_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{repairItemId}),'%')
or u2.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{ordererName}),'%')
or u1.identity_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{receiverIdentityId}),'%')
or u1.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{receiverName}),'%')
